arabic: إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَإِيَّاكَ نَسْتَعِينُ
translation: You ˹alone˺ we worship and You ˹alone˺ we ask for help.

arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
translation: This is the Book! There is no doubt about it—a guide for those mindful ˹of Allah˺.

arabic: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ أُجِيبُ دَعۡوَةَ ٱلدَّاعِ إِذَا دَعَانِۖ
translation: When My servants ask you ˹O Prophet˺ about Me: I am truly near. I respond to one’s prayer when they call upon Me.

arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحۡزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
translation: Do not falter or grieve, for you will have the upper hand, if you are ˹true˺ believers.

arabic: وَعِندَهُۥ مَفَاتِحُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَا يَعۡلَمُهَآ إِلَّا هُوَۚ
translation: With Him are the keys of the unseen—no one knows them except Him.

arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ آمَنُواْ وَتَطۡمَئِنُّ قُلُوبُهُم بِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِۗ أَلَا بِذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ تَطۡمَئِنُّ ٱلۡقُلُوبُ
translation: Those who believe and whose hearts find comfort in the remembrance of Allah. Surely in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find comfort.

arabic: لَئِن شَكَرۡتُمۡ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمۡۖ وَلَئِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ إِنَّ عَذَابِي لَشَدِيدٞ
translation: If you are thankful, I will certainly give you more. But if you are ungrateful, surely My punishment is severe.

arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحۡمَةٗ وَهَيِّئۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا رَشَدٗا
translation: Our Lord! Grant us mercy from Yourself and guide us rightly through our ordeal.

arabic: إِنَّنِيٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعۡبُدۡنِي وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ لِذِكۡرِيٓ
translation: It is truly I. I am Allah! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Me. So worship Me ˹alone˺, and establish prayer for My remembrance.

arabic: قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is Allah—One ˹and Indivisible˺; Allah—the Sustainer ˹needed by all˺. He has never had offspring, nor was He born. And there is none comparable to Him.”

arabic: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَآ إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوْلَىٰنَاۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلْيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: Say, “Nothing will ever befall us except what Allah has destined for us. He is our Protector.” So in Allah let the believers put their trust.

arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنبِهِۦٓ أَوْ قَاعِدًا أَوْ قَآئِمًۭا
translation: When someone is touched with hardship, they cry out to Us whether lying down, sitting, or standing.

arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ قَدْ جَآءَتْكُم مَّوْعِظَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ وَشِفَآءٌۭ لِّمَا فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
translation: O humanity! There has come to you ˹enlightenment˺ from your Lord—a healing for what is in the hearts.

arabic: وَمَا مِن دَآبَّةٍۢ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ رِزْقُهَا
translation: There is no creature on earth whose provision is not upon Allah.

arabic: وَلَا تَيْـَٔسُوا۟ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يَيْـَٔسُ مِن رَّوْحِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
translation: Never despair of Allah’s mercy. Indeed, no one despairs of Allah’s mercy except the disbelieving people.

arabic: وَإِن تَعُدُّوا۟ نِعْمَتَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحْصُوهَآۗ
translation: And if you tried to count Allah’s blessings, you could never enumerate them.

arabic: فَلَا تَقُل لَّهُمَآ أُفٍّۢ وَلَا تَنْهَرْهُمَا وَقُل لَّهُمَا قَوْلًۭا كَرِيمًۭا
translation: Do not even say “Uff” to your parents, nor scold them. Speak to them kindly.

arabic: وَلَا تَقْفُ مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ
translation: Do not follow what you do not know.

arabic: ٱلْمَالُ وَٱلْبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا
translation: Wealth and children are [but] adornment of this worldly life.

arabic: لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
translation: There is no god but You. Glory be to You! I was truly among the wrongdoers.

arabic: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ
translation: Successful indeed are the believers.

arabic: ٱللَّهُ نُورُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ
translation: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.

arabic: وَعِبَادُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلَّذِينَ يَمْشُونَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ هَوْنًۭا
translation: The servants of the Most Merciful are those who walk humbly upon the earth.

arabic: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
translation: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me.

arabic: وَٱبْتَغِ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ وَلَا تَنسَ نَصِيبَكَ مِنَ ٱلدُّنْيَا
translation: Seek the Hereafter with what Allah has given you, but do not forget your share of this world.

arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتْرَكُوٓا۟ أَن يَقُولُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمْ لَا يُفْتَنُونَ
translation: Do people think they will be left alone because they say “We believe” without being tested?

arabic: أَنِ ٱشْكُرْ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيْكَ
translation: Be grateful to Me and to your parents.

arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَقُولُواْ قَوْلًۭا سَدِيدًۭا
translation: O believers! Be mindful of Allah, and say what is right.

arabic: إِنَّمَا يَخْشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنْ عِبَادِهِ ٱلْعُلَمَـٰٓؤُا۟
translation: Only those who have knowledge fear Allah among His servants.

arabic: سَلَـٰمٌۭ قَوْلًۭا مِّن رَّبٍّۢ رَّحِيمٍۢ
translation: “Peace!”—a word from the Merciful Lord.

arabic: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُمْ وَمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
translation: It is Allah who created you and what you do.

arabic: قُلْ يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ
translation: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ that Allah says, “O My servants who have exceeded the limits against their souls! Do not lose hope in Allah’s mercy.

arabic: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ ٱدْعُونِىٓ أَسْتَجِبْ لَكُمْ
translation: Your Lord has proclaimed: “Call upon Me—I will respond to you.”

arabic: ٱدْفَعْ بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ
translation: Respond to evil with what is better.

arabic: وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰ
translation: What is with Allah is far better and more lasting.

arabic: إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتْقَىٰكُمْ
translation: The most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous.

arabic: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ ٱلْوَرِيدِ
translation: We are closer to him than his jugular vein.

arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
translation: I did not create jinn and mankind except to worship Me.

arabic: فَبِأَىِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ
translation: So which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

arabic: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفْسُ ٱلْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ ٱرْجِعِىٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةًۭ مَّرْضِيَّةًۭ فَٱدْخُلِى فِى عِبَـٰدِى وَٱدْخُلِى جَنَّتِى
translation: O tranquil soul, return to your Lord—well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺. So join My servants, and enter My Paradise.
